message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the effects of poison on organisms. Poison is known to cause harm to living organisms. Options (B), (C), and (D) are incorrect because they do not describe the harmful effects of poison.

Option (D) is incorrect because decaying things are already beyond the point of being affected by poison.
